item.title: [Book] What You Do Is Who You Are
item.description: â­ï¸â­ï¸ï¸ï¸ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸ï¸ï¸ | What You Do Is Who You Are - Ben Horowitz After his book The Hard Thing About Hard Things, Ben Horowitz from the famous VC firm Andreessen Horowitz is back at it with one of his favourite subject: company culture. This time he goes through three historical leaders, how they defined their culture, managed it day to day and ultimately how this can apply to your business culture.
